entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -39.1°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
